body:
I Have some Questions 
First: When did avicus have Survival? 
Second: How old is avicus?
Cya!

title: Question!

replies.body:
when did avikus have survival : last time the mad devs failed to upload a map

how old is avikus : errrmmm like 3 years.

replies.body:
Question 1: Its just a glitch for some players, if you ever get this glitch please relog!

Question 2: Well just for Avicus it was November 2nd, 2013. And for Mczone-Avicus i believe Oct. 9th, 2012
